医学新闻来自News -Medical.net-世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-gb
从黄油转变为植物性油，与降低死亡率风险有关研究人员比较了黄油或植物油的消费如何影响总死亡率。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250311/switching-from-butter-to-plant-to-plant-to-light-oils-oils-linked-to-lower-to-lower-mortality-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250311/switching-from-butter-to-plant-to-plant-to-light-to-linked-to-linked to-lower-mortality-mortality-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7814b5ce-bf7D-4370-A421-99CCE9C9E2DD Tue, 11 Mar 2025 05:21:00 -0400 Switching from butter to plant-based oils linked to lower mortality risk
孕产妇使用障碍与增加儿童行为障碍的风险有关研究人员确定孕妇在怀孕期间和之后如何影响孩子的行为。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250311/maternal-cannabis-use-disorder-disorder-disord-to-crist------------------------ of-of-of-of-of-child-bebehild-behavioral-disorders.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250311/maternal-cannabis-use-disorder-disorder-linked-to incred-to-to-to-of-of-of-of-of-of-of-of-child-behild-behavioral-disorders.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7f233fc5-2e81-432d-8de0-e03b7f41255f Tue, 11 Mar 2025 05:05:00 -0400 Maternal cannabis use disorder linked to increased risk of child behavioral disorders
消化道疾病进展和治疗中的新调节剂这篇发表在基因与疾病中的新文章强调了tRNA衍生的小RNA（TSRNA）在消化道疾病中的关键作用，将这些分子定位为诊断，预后和靶向疗法的潜在生物标志物。综合综述探讨了TSRNA的生物发生，分类和生物学功能，阐明了它们对细胞过程的影响，例如翻译调节，表观遗传学修饰和蛋白质相互作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250311/novel-regulators-in-digestive-digestive-tract-disease-progression-progression-progression-and-woreatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250311/novel-regulators-in-digestive-digestive-tract-disease-progression-progression-progression-progression-and-woreatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=81550A2E-75A4-4F7F-ADC1-ADC1-5ECAFA9AE81 Tue, 11 Mar 2025 04:00:18 -0400 Novel regulators in digestive tract disease progression and treatment
研究揭示了转录因子作为MAFLD中治疗网关的作用代谢功能障碍相关的脂肪肝疾病（MAFLD）已成为全球健康的关注，影响了全球数百万。这种复杂的肝脏疾病范围从简单的脂肪变性到更严重的形式，包括代谢功能障碍相关的脂肪性肝炎（MASH），可能会发展为纤维化，肝硬化甚至肝癌。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250311/study-reveals-the-prole-ole-of-transcription-factors-as-as-therapeutic-gaterways-in-mafld.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250311/study-reveals-the--role-of-transcription-factors-as-as-therapeutic-gateways-in-mafld.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=Afe66925-b005-43d3-9db9-6f8dc011cb7d Tue, 11 Mar 2025 03:49:09 -0400 Study reveals the role of transcription factors as therapeutic gateways in MAFLD
研究研究了与职业暴露有关的基因突变职业和环境暴露会使特定的人群患癌症的风险更高，包括消防员。弥撒一般研究人员的一项新研究研究了很少在消防员中研究的癌症：胶质瘤 - 一种在大脑或脊髓中形成的肿瘤类型。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250311/study-investigates-genetic-genetic-mutations-complect-linked-to-occupational-exposures.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250311/study-investigates-genetic-mutations-linked-to-occupational-exposurations.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bd31f3e1-0711-44f2-bda7-ee38a3462cb2 Tue, 11 Mar 2025 03:41:43 -0400 Study investigates genetic mutations linked to occupational exposures
乳腺癌中解码程序性细胞死亡这篇评论强调了泛素特异性蛋白酶（USP）在调节乳腺癌（BC）中调节程序性细胞死亡（PCD）中的关键作用。作为女性中最普遍的恶性肿瘤，卑诗省仍然是全球重大的健康挑战。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250311/decoding-programmed-celgmed-celmmed-cell-death-in-breast-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250311/decoding-programmed-celmmed-cell-cell-death-in-breast-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c3f27AA8-71EE-4897-8791-F2027A2912FF Tue, 11 Mar 2025 03:26:00 -0400 Decoding programmed cell death in breast cancer
研究强调了ELF4作为发育，免疫和肿瘤学中关键转录因子的作用ELF4是属于ETS家族的转录因子，已成为细胞分化，免疫系统功能和癌症进展的关键调节剂。这项新发表的评论强调了其分子复杂性和临床意义，阐明了其在肿瘤抑制和肿瘤发生中的双重作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250311/study-highlights-the-role-of-4-as-a-a-key-key-transcription-factor-in-indevelopment-indevelopment-munity-munity-munity-andoncology.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250311/study-highlights-the-role-of-4-as-a-a-key-key-transcription-factor-in-indevelopment-indevelopment-indevelopment-mmunity-mmunity-andoncology.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=019f4e64-2c2c-4b2b-9f3f-45b451a777707b Tue, 11 Mar 2025 02:03:44 -0400 Study highlights the role of ELF4 as a key transcription factor in development, immunity, and oncology
解密子宫内膜癌中的肿瘤免疫相互作用发表在基因与疾病中的一篇新评论文章阐明了复杂的分子机制，通过该机制，肿瘤浸润的免疫细胞调节子宫内膜癌（EC）。作为最普遍的妇科癌症之一，由于其与免疫微环境的动态相互作用，EC继续挑战研究人员和临床医生。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250311/deciphering-the-the-the-tumor-immune-interplay-in-endometrial-carcinoma.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250311/deciphering-the-the-the-tumor-mmmune-interplay-in-endometrial-carcinoma.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=342D05E7-07A2-4A88-A100-A100-9C4597E844452 Tue, 11 Mar 2025 01:53:01 -0400 Deciphering the tumor-immune interplay in endometrial carcinoma
研究揭示了基于TCM的铁凋亡调节策略对铁吞作用的创新见解是一种独特的程序性细胞死亡形式，正在重塑疾病治疗的景观。这个越来越多的领域突出了传统中药（TCM）如何有效地调节铁凋亡，为各种疾病提供新颖的治疗方法，包括癌症，心血管疾病，神经退行性疾病和器官损伤。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250311/study-reveals-tcm基于strategies-for-ferroptosis-modulation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250311/study-reveals-tcm基于-strategies-for-ferroptosis-modulation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=568167f9-A1A8-4462-B112-C6D3BF319841 Tue, 11 Mar 2025 01:49:09 -0400 Study reveals TCM-Based strategies for ferroptosis modulation
利用LNCRNA进行早期诊断和干预急性肾脏损伤长期非编码RNA（LNCRNA）发表在基因与疾病中的一项新评论突出了它们在急性肾脏损伤（AKI）和慢性肾脏疾病（CKD）的发育，诊断和潜在治疗中的关键作用。这些发现强调了外泌体LNCRNA的重要性，后者在肾脏病理学中充当分子调节剂，并对未来的生物标志物发现和治疗性进步抱有希望。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250311/harnessing-lncrnas-for-early-diangnosis-and-ingnosis-and-intervention-invention-invention-invention-in-utute-kidney-injury.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250311/harnessing-lncrnas-for-early-diarly-diarly-diangnosis-and-intervention-ing-intervention-in-utute-kidney-kidney-injury.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=34b8e55555555555558-413a-b3f9-b3f9-23ccebf53136 Tue, 11 Mar 2025 01:36:24 -0400 Harnessing lncRNAs for early diagnosis and intervention in acute kidney injury
